title: Keir Starmer told to ramp up attacks on Nigel Farage rather than 'collaborative' rival as PM's premiership left on the brink
tags: 'You've missed the point!' GB News star slaps down Labour Minister after attempting to defend PM;Labour MP tells GB News Keir Starmer is 'finished' as pressure mounts on PM over Mandelson scandal;Voters demand Keir Starmer quits as PM after Lord Mandelson scandal puts premiership on the brink;The GB News Editorial Charter
